main event: Four round, disc-shaped objects were observed in Fort Edward, New York on August 6, 1963.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be 40-50 feet in diameter., They were moving in parallel and then converged before climbing out of sight., The sighting lasted for approximately 11 minutes., The objects emitted no sound and left no trail., There is a possibility the sightings were weather balloons or other phenomena.
witness description: both witnesses were residents of Fort Edward, the first a technician for Western Electric and the second his sister.
